item.title: Automated MySQL Backups to Amazon S3 with AutoMySQLBackups
item.description: This how-to will teach you how to take automated backups of all your MySQL databases and send them to Amazon S3. Access (Logins) required root login for the server (sudo is required to run automysqlbackup, root is req. to add to root userâ€™s cron) admin login for the mysql server (to provide for backup config file) IAM access keys to use with s3cmd (to configure s3cmd)
